original_text:
Against you, you only, have I sinned
    and done what is evil in your sight,
so that you may be justified in your words
    and blameless in your judgment.
korean_text: 내가 주께만 범죄하여 주의 목전에 악을 행하였사오니 주께서 말씀하실 때에 의로우시다 하고 주께서 심판하실 때에 순전하시다 하리이다

sentences.original_text: Against you, you only, have I sinned
and done what is evil in your sight
so that you may be justified in your words
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 주의 말씀에 의롭다 하심을 얻으려 함이며
